    • Method Detail

      • onend

        public boolean onend()
        Description copied from class: Fight
        Called when a battle ends but before EndBattle clean-ups.
        Specified by:
        onend in class Minigame
        Returns:
        If true will perform a bunch of post-battle clean-ups, usually required only for typical Scenario battles but not for Minigames.

      • getmonsters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Combatant> getmonsters(java.lang.Integer teamel)
        Specified by:
        getmonsters in class Fight
        Parameters:
        teamel - usually comes from Fight.getel(int), and so might be null.
        Returns:
        The list of monsters that are going to be featured in this fight. If null, will then use #getel(JavelinApp, int).
